| History                 = Upon [[Max Eisenhardt (Earth-616)|Magneto]]'s departure of Santo Marco, head of the [[Santo Marco Armed Forces (Earth-616)|Santo Marco Armed Forces]] [[Luis Augustine (Earth-616)|General Luis Augustine]] assumed control of the country, plunging it into another era of dictatorship, and prompting the formation by outspoken activist [[Carlos Zapatero (Earth-616)|Carlos Zapatero]] of the '''Popular Front for Santo Marco'''.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]]'s entry}}

The Popular Front continued to harbor a grudge towards the [[Brotherhood of Evil Mutants (Earth-616)|Brotherhood]] for enabling Augustine's rise to power.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]]'s entry}}
